derivation: feminine of a derivative of (an army;
strongs_def: from the base of G4766 (στρατιά), as encamped); camp-likeness, i.e. an army, i.e. (figuratively) the angels, the celestial luminaries
outline:
1. an army, band of soldiers
  2. in the NT, the hosts of heaven
    1. troops of angels
    2. the heavenly bodies, stars of heaven (so called on account of their number and their order)
